general_info.summary: This document provides a comprehensive list of various programs, schools, reports, initiatives, and resources offered or related to Sharda University. It covers academic offerings such as the School of Dental Sciences and Nursing, examination reports, curriculum feedback, and initiatives like the Academic Bank of Credits. The list also includes information on university structure (leadership, history, statutory bodies), operational aspects (tenders, act/statutes), student support services (counseling, skill enhancement), and external engagement (FM Radio, international campuses, cybercrime reporting).

career_info.summary: This text outlines potential career paths for individuals completing a Nutritionist and Dietetics course, highlighting employment opportunities in educational institutions, research institutes, and both private and government hospitals. It encourages readers to pursue a career in allied health sciences.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Popular areas of employment for such Nutritionists and Dietetics include:
• Colleges, Schools, Research institutes
• Private or Government Hospitals
Take the next step towards a career in allied health sciences.

services.summary: This document outlines various services and guidelines relevant to international visitors or residents in India, including banking and postal services, accommodation fees, visa and FRO/FRRO procedures, medical insurance, observership programs, and a mentoring portal called Paramarsh.
